title: Fish Girl
description: Who is Fish Girl?What is Fish Girl?She lives in a tank in a boardwalk aquarium. She is the main attraction, though visitors never get more than a glimpse of her.She has a tail. She can't walk. She can't speak.But she can make friends with Livia, an ordinary girl, and yearn for a life that includes yoga and pizza. She can grow stronger and braver. With determination, a touch of magic, and the help of a loyal octopus, she can do anything.
author: Donna Jo Napoli
